biotools.summary: CycloPsWeb generates structures for and displays properties of cyclised and linear peptides. Information includes solid-phase peptide synthesis feasibility, Octanol-water partition coefficient, and drug-like properties Structural representations are available in 1D SMILES, 2D .png image, and 3D .sdf formats Functionality for generating libraries of cyclised peptides, including commercially available non-natural amino acids is available in the standalone CycloPs client.

bioschemas.name: CycloPs
